casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Hlavsa, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Hlavsa (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 131.]

(No. 00-1177 Submitted January 31, 2001 Decided March 7, 2001.)

The judgment of the court of appeals relating to the counts of anal rape is reversed, and the cause is remanded for a; new trial on those counts pursuant to the decision and opinion in State v. Wells (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 32, 740 N.E.2d 1097.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
